amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to increase funding for Army Corps Investigations account by $1.2 million, for a total of $129.2 million, offset by a reduction of $1.2 million in the Army Corps Expenses account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (NY) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Collins (NY).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Collins (NY) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
